SMW Subobject for SaradominExamine: The colours of Saradomin.Is members only: trueIs variant of: Hooded cloakUses infobox: ItemImage: File:Hooded cloak (Saradomin).pngWeight: 0.001Value: 1Version anchor: SaradominRelease date: 13 December 2004Item ID: 4041

The hooded cloak is an item used in the Castle Wars minigame to indicate a player's team. Players are given their team's hooded cloak when they enter any of the three God portals: Zamorak, Saradomin or Guthix. Because of this cloak players are not allowed to wear anything in the cape or helmet slots.

The cloak allows the player to teleport back to their team's starting room by using the 'Surrender' option, providing their current hitpoints are below 15%. Similarly to dying, this fully replenishes the player's stats and run energy.

The '''hooded cloak''' is an item used in the [[Castle Wars]] [[minigame]] to indicate a player's team. Players are given their team's hooded cloak when they enter any of the three [[God]] portals: [[Zamorak]], [[Saradomin]] or [[Guthix]]. Because of this cloak players are '''not''' allowed to wear anything in the cape or helmet slots.

The cloak allows the player to teleport back to their team's starting room by using the 'Surrender' option, providing their current hitpoints are below 15%. Similarly to dying, this fully replenishes the player's stats and run energy.
